news_header: Finland faces a significant carbon sink deficit, requiring urgent policy changes to meet EU climate targets.
news_original_title: Suomella on aivan jäätävä hiilinieluvelka metsissä – näin sitä voitaisiin helpottaa rajoittamatta hakkuita
news_text: Finland's carbon sink deficit has reached alarming levels, prompting calls for urgent policy changes, including revising the Forest Act and implementing taxes on wood fuels. Experts warn that without action, meeting future EU climate targets will be impossible.
